name: Theater Puppet Maker
desc: After the team uses a total of 6 Ultimate(s) while not under the Overclock effect, gains Overclock: After attacking with an Ultimate, deals Aftertaste DMG equal to 130% of the attacker's ATK 3 time(s). After using an Ultimate, this status will end. The character in position 1 in the current team activates their Ultimate, Charges Brain in a Vat to 200%, and uses Ultimate 4 times before the status ends on them.
